special_text:
[i](Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.)[/i]
When Meeting of the Elites enters, create a tapped Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
You’ve sacrificed a nonland permanent this turn.
rules_text2:
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library.
You may play cards exiled with Aristocracy as long as you’ve sacrificed a nonland permanent this turn.
